external_references.source_name: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025
external_references.description: Matej Havranek. (2025, February 20). DeceptiveDevelopment targets freelance developers. Retrieved October 17, 2025.
Unit 42. (2023, November 21). Hacking Employers and Seeking Employment: Two Job-Related Campaigns Bear Hallmarks of North Korean Threat Actors. Retrieved October 17, 2025.

objects.description: [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has collected the internal IP address, IP geolocation information of the infected host and sends the data to a C2 server.(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023) [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has also leveraged the “pay” module to obtain region name, country, city, zip code, ISP, latitude and longitude using “http://ip-api.com/json”.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)
